entry.title: dotnet/announcements - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2021-43877 | ASP.NET Core Elevation of privilege Vulnerability #206
  • December 2021 .NET Updates #205

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • QueueProcessingOrder.NewestFirst WaitAsync should drop the oldest item when the queue is full #62817
  • Assertion failed '(tree->gtFlags & GTF_GLOB_REF) || ((obj != nullptr) && (obj->gtOper == GT_LCL_VAR))' during 'Morph - Structs/AddrExp' (IL size 36) #62815
  • Different behavior of ECDsa.ExportParameters between .NET 4.8 and .NET [Core] #62813
  • Certificate errors on .NET5/6 on Debian 11 (bullseye-slim) #62810
  • PeriodicTimer_ActiveOperations_TimerRooted failure on Debian 10 #62809
  • WebAssembly: brotli and AOT result in assert in aot-runtime.c:2038 #62806
    6.0.x
  • [API Proposal]: Allow set/get access to Array elements by absolute index. #62795
  • DeflateStream ctor is substantially slower on macOS than ubuntu #62791
  • FileInfo.Length throws a throws a System.IO.FileNotFoundException after FileInfo.Delete() #62792
  • CoreCLR breaks the ECMA spec (I.12.3.2.1) with ldsflda for custom types #62784
  • createdump requires root user #62781
  • Cookie name are case-sensitive #62778
    Future
  • [wasm][debugger] Display custom accessors the same way as in Console Application #62774
  • Obsolete unused static ServicePointManager members #62770
    7.0.0
  • MemoryMappedFile always flushing on dispose - even if nothing was written? #62768
  • System.Text.Json generator does not generate valid code for empty string default parameter constructors #62766
    6.0.x
  • System.Text.Json does not correctly handle nested inner types of a generic outer type. #62762
  • Possible PriorityChannel #62761
  • checked corerun annoyances #62760
  • Test failure Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.PhysicalFileProviderTests.UsePollingFileWatcher_UseActivePolling_HasChanged_SymbolicLink(useWildcard: False) #62759
  • Planned work for System.Text.RegularExpressions for 7.0.0 #62758
    7.0.0
  • Some outer loop tests on Linux fail unless run as root #62756

Closed

  • threading/NamedMutex/test1/paltest_namedmutex_test1 failed #62336
  • Extra bounds checks are being generated in common span usage pattern #10950
    Future
  • BindToDirectory throws NullReferenceException on Linux when LdapConnection AuthType is Anonymous #61683
  • Remove redundant configuration from [DllImport] declaration #33808
    Future
  • sslStream.AuthenticateAsServer does not send the root certificate during TLS handshake #62699
    7.0.0
  • [System.Text.Json] Why is it calling my constructors and not simply instantiating memory? #62734
  • classloader NestedStructs case 03, 04, and 05 failing in mono full AOT #62567
    7.0.0
  • Broken dependencies in Microsoft.NET.Runtime.MonoTargets.Sdk #60066
  • HttpClient rejects valid certificates for dot-appended FQDNs #57792
    Future
  • [test] Rename build.sh 'excludemonofailures' option to 'mono' #62745
  • Metadata for type 'CLASS' was not provided to the serializer, but it was. #62546
  • NetworkInterfaceType for System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInterface is always 0 on Android 11 #51984
    7.0.0
  • Make mono runtime tests stop using patching #43952
    7.0.0
  • UnwindManagedExceptionPass1 crashes on virtual dispatch stub when handling System.NullReferenceException on macOS ARM64 #62058
  • Access Violation through reflection not caught as NRE on .NET 6 #61486
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Making user secrets optional by default #62821
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Use wildcards for NativeAOT libs #62820
    area-Meta
  • Undo breaking change in 6.0 in environment variable configuration prefix support #62819
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Add optimization "X & 1 == 1" to "X & 1" (#61412) #62818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] [wasm][debugger] Avoiding assert on mono runtime #62816
    Servicing-consider, area-Debugger-mono
  • Updated tracking issue #62814
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • IL cleanup - remove .module and make .assembly match source name #62812
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Make `ControlFlowBuilder.Clear` public. #62811
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Add runtime-community.yml pipeline and add s390x job #62808
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.x
  • Fix bugs with generation for ctor param default values #62798
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Use 1ES pool instead of deprecated windows image in "Publish to Build Asset Registry" job #62797
    area-Infrastructure
  • [mono] Fix types for arguments to printf calls #62796
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Try to improve HttpConnectionPool lock contention #62794
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Net.Http
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0 #62790
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #62789
  • [Infra] Revert removal of clr dependency from mono builds #62788
    area-Infrastructure
  • Bump SdkBandVersion prop to 6.0.200 #62787
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix source-link test #62786
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Add ubuntu 21.10 to CI matrix #62783
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Increase count of bit for emitAddrMode::amScale #62782
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Android] Fix accessing network interfaces information #62780
    area-System.Net
  • [wasm] Testing with NodeJs on CI #62779
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • Fix race conditions in SystemEvents shutdown logic #62773
    area-Microsoft.Win32, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Add explicit null-check for tailcalls to VSD #62769
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable some suspicious tests which might lead to OOM crashes on Android emulators and arm64 devices #62767
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Security
  • [6.0] Fix named mutexes on OSX to work between arm64 and emulated x64 processes #62765
    area-System.Threading, 6.0.x
  • Bring over NativeAOT smoke tests #62763
  • [wasm] Backport build improvements, and fixes from #61581 #62757
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 6.0.x

Merged

  • Fix __SkipRestorePackages setup for msbuild during tests build #62583
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add NativeAOT to build #62569
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Build NativeAOT flavor of clrcompression static lib #62570
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Fix named mutex PAL test issue #62655
    area-PAL-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Disable HardwareIntrinsics Pause tests #62793
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fixing regression for AuthType.Anonymous which leads to a NullReferenceException be thrown. #62807
    area-System.DirectoryServices
  • Deduplicate JIT/Methodical/Boxing/xlang tests #62753
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix range checks for "i >= 0 && i < cns" patterns #61569
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Avoiding assert on mono runtime #62601
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix named mutexes on OSX to work between arm64 and emulated x64 processes #62764
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Rename IHttpHeadersHandler to IHttpStreamHeadersHandler #62750
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Remove dummy project property IlasmRoundTrip #62678
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Unify native file name props #62724
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • PE loader/image cleanups. No-copy mapping of R2R PEs on Windows. #61938
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Make mono runtime tests stop using patching in CI; remove dependency on coreclr #62652
  • [wasm] Make typescript and rollup build incremental #62772
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • Remove AOT warnings for S.Drawing.Common #61567
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution
  • Introduce automation rules for PR workflows #62534
    area-Infrastructure
  • [tests] Re-enable some explicit layout tests on Mono #62746
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix SendPacketsAsync failures on macos #62726
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Add explicit null-check for tailcalls to VSD #62719
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Fix imports: require, exit, quit #62712
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Removing trailing dot from a SNI host in TLS #62540
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Add support for NativeAOT testing #62704
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Generalize loop pre-header creation and loop hoisting #62560
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Rename 'excludemonofailures' to 'mono' #62749
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add more precise descriptor for RuntimeAssembly #62737
    area-CoreLib-mono

Updated

  • Unify the FlushProcessWriteBuffers mechanism for macOS arm64 / x64 #62822
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Pass HFA/HVA in registers #62623
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update libunwind to v1.6.2 #62092
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Convert JIT/Methodical/Array/range Pri0 tests and hook up mobile testing #62752
    area-Infrastructure
  • Change all "unmanaged" (no GC fields) sequential types to have sequential layout. #61759
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add support for running debugger tests CI #62431
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [MonoAOTCompiler] more properties & custom WorkingDirectory #62725
  • [release/6.0] fix issue where HTTP2 connection could be scavenged but not disposed #62236
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fix custom JsonConverterFactories not working with nested type/property declarations. #62643
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fixing a possible null reference error in WebSocket deflate. #62716
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net, 6.0.x
  • Add runtime-extra-platforms pipeline to have matching runtime PR and Rolling builds #62564
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Improve ARM64 JIT disassembly #62557
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/5.0] Fixes #62167. WriteAsync may truncate data if called after .Advance(int) #62350
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO.Pipelines, 5.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fixes #62167. WriteAsync may truncate data if called after .Advance(int) #62348
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO.Pipelines, 6.0.x
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1512942 #62663
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • .NET number values such as positive and negative infinity cannot be written as valid JSON. #62690
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Do not promote struct locals with holes #62738
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] [wasm][debugger] View multidimensional array when debugging #62283
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono, 6.0.2
  • [wasm] updated samples for ES6 and CJS #62292
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • emit branchless form of (i >= 0 && j >= 0)/(i!=0&& j!= 0) for signed integers #62689
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add custom marshaller tests for delegates #62691
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Add 'w' and 's' bit to xarch instruction flags. #61198
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Expose general purpose Crc32 APIs #61558
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Improve inliner - static readonly fields, pinvokes, Span::Length #62421
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • CI matrix change: Add OSX 12 arm #59085
    blocked, area-Infrastructure
  • CI matrix change: Windows #58989
    area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm][debugger] Add Browsable Attribute support. #62045
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Port Mono to Raspberry Pi, ship as new linux-armv6 RID #62594
    area-Infrastructure-mono, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [arm64] JIT: Redundant zero/sign extensions after ldrX/ldrsX #62630
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Do not create non-null assertions from location nodes #62743
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve String.Substring performance #62577
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • [DRAFT][wasm] Switch default modules to es6 #62740
    NO REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Refactor FileStatus.Unix. #62721
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Backport all CI matrix changes from 7.0 to reelase/6.0 #62538
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Wasm marshaler API for user-defined types; migrate Uri and DateTime to new API #47640
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • installing dotnet sdk on docker image fails with the new version of dotnet-sdk-5.0-5.0.404-1.x86_64 and aspnetcore-runtime-5.0.x86_64 0:5.0.13-1 #23069
  • Dotnet Watch Run indefinitely reloads #23051

Closed

  • BindingRedirect warning behaves inconsistently #19391
    Discussion
  • Include `$(RootNamespace)` by default for a project with implicit usings enabled #22535
  • Re-enable test ItShouldShowWarningMessageOnCollectCodeCoverageThatProfilerWasNotInitialized if appropriate #22865
  • It was not possible to find any installed .NET SDKs. #22508
    Discussion

PullRequests

Created

  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1.1xx #23061
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1.4xx #23060
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0.2xx #23059
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0.4xx #23058
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.1xx #23057
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Skip Wasm-Tools Workload Install and Test Run When Build Fails #23068
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Upgrade vstest packages and fix tests #23039
    Area-DotNet Test
  • Fix ordering of gathering files from Sdks #23048
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Merge 6.0.2xx to main #22966
  • Update to use new Razor transport packages #22902
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Update .vsts-ci.yml #23022
    Area-Infrastructure
  • upgrade ubuntu version #22879
    Area-Infrastructure

Issues

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Consider fading unnecessary/trivial discard pattern #58331
    Backlog
  • Source generated file keeps Miscellaneous Files color/message even if features are enabled #58329
    17.2
  • System.InvalidProgramException when constructing a record struct with parameter list and calling the default constructor #58328
    17.2
  • Parameter null checking incorrectly handled in arglist operations #58322
    17.2
  • Parameter null checking only included in IOperation when body is bound #58320
    17.2
  • [LSP] Do not use IsOpen in LSP scenarios #58319
    Backlog
  • Using EnvDTE and vsCMAccess to set an access modifier is causing code deletion #58315
    17.1

Closed

  • Allow customization of auto-generated XML comments #58224
    Backlog
  • Ability to auto add string intrapolation character "$" at the beginning of the string if a valid "{" is typed inside the string. #58223
  • Warn if conversion depends on the order in which interfaces are specified in class base #58258
    Compiler.Next
  • Warning on var-declared variables that are never null assigned #58262
  • C# 10 Global Usings Performance #58279
  • Change of behavior in symbol comparison with SymbolEqualityComparer #58226
  • Parameter null checking needs to ensure testing for use in delegate parameters #58323
    17.2
  • "Name can be simplified" code fix results in invalid code (build error) #57767
    17.1

PullRequests

Created

  • Resolve PROTOTYPE comments in param null checking #58324
    Area-Compilers
  • Improve usability of "enable nullable reference types" refactoring #58316
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Nullable enable GetTypeByMetadataName #58317
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Fix the bad words in TestDeepAlternation #58330
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58325
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Push classification caching to be an internal detail of semantic classification. #58326
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix regression of LambdaSymbol.GetHashCode #58247
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Check operations when doing type name simplification #58285
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update the status of required members. #58308
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to features/rename_ui_rework #58314
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #58313
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58312
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/rename_ui_rework #58334
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #58333
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58332
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add support for interpolations in raw string literals. #57979
    Area-Compilers
  • Support CodeClass2.Parts returning parts in source generated files #58241
    Area-IDE
  • Add support for nullable analysis in interpolated string handler constructors #57780
    Area-Compilers
  • IDE code generator service refactoring #58244
    Area-IDE
  • Semi auto implemented properties #57076
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Synthesize delegate types for lambdas with parameter types or return type that are not valid type arguments #57295
    Area-Compilers
  • Port CSharpCodeActions and CSharpFindReferences to the new test harness #58037
    Area-IDE
  • Record list-patterns and newlines in interpolations as done #58250
    Area-Compilers
  • Cache the delegate for static method group conversions. #58288
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • [LSP] Add semantic token caching for solution open #58238
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Using Custom ILogger with ErrorBoundary produces exception = null #39039
  • Consider producing fewer log files per Helix work item (10k+ in some instances) #39038
  • Hosted services start later with minimal API #39037
  • Pass PDB Deltas to MetadataUpdateHandler #39036
    7.0-preview1
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries #39033
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2021-43877 | ASP.NET Core Elevation of privilege Vulnerability #39028
  • Update Release Manifests with New Packages #39027
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Razor.RuntimeCompilation 3.1.22 has broken dependencies on NuGet #39020
  • [Question] A way to completely disable authentication on a method #39019
  • [.NET 6 Blazor server] can't catch properly an ObjectDisposedException when stream from c# to Js #39017
    .NET 7 Planning
  • [Blazor WASM] Caching problem leading to service worker update problems #39016
    .NET 7 Planning

Closed

  • Update baseline & Clean up baseline suppressions in 7.0 #35431
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Failed to start process with commandline, ErrorCode = '0x80070002' #25311
    7.0-preview1
  • NET 6 - Minimal APIs Docker Error M1 Macbook Pro #38876
  • Blazor dotnet publish error Microsoft.NET.Sdk.BlazorWebAssembly.ComputeBlazorPublishAssets.GroupExistingStaticWebAssets #39000
  • Optional Certificates - With Host names instead of IP's #37753
    7.0-preview1
  • Perf improvement: updates #38974
  • The runtime<->aspnetcore shared src is out of sync #18943
  • Reopen 7439 - ModelState json serialization should be camel cased #17999
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Razor class libraries static resources are not available in another project #38924
  • Render another partial view (B) within a partial view (A) by specifying relative path to current partial view (A) #39014
  • Prevent ASP.NET Core SignalR Hub from being cached from CDN on LongPolling #38437
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Publishing issue with output files with the same relative path #39012
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #39001
  • How to access PageModel in classlibrary #38972

PullRequests

Created

  • Reimplement the concurrency limiter middleware to use the new abstractions & implementations #39040
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Use full suffixed version for DepProviderKey in installers #39035
    tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Update branding to 2.1.32 & merge internal commits #39029
    2.1.x
  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1 #39026
    3.1.x
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0 #39025
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.x
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #39024
    6.0.x

Merged

  • Updated sample to use new TLS Api #39015
    area-security, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • Use full suffixed version for DepProviderKey in installers #39022
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Remove SuppressBaselineReference items from 6.0 #39023
    7.0-preview1
  • Port MSRC fixes #39034
    7.0-preview1
  • Add a dependency on System.Threading.RateLimiting #39021
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Prevent SignalR Hub from being cached from CDN on LongPolling #38901
    area-signalr, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • HTTP/3: Optimize validating and setting incoming headers #39013
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • [release/3.1] Remove Helix remnants #39004
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.x
  • [WIP] ANCM on ARM64 #38997
  • Use JSON Property Name attributes when creating ModelState Validation errors #39008
    area-mvc
  • [DRAFT][wasm] dotnet.js modularization #38721
    area-blazor
  • Simplify some build infrastructure #38980
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Failed to instal maui-windows workload on ARM64 #3764
  • [Windows] The shadow doesn't shows when using the GraphicsView #3762
  • [WebAuthenticator] NullReferenceException on CallbackResult #3760
  • [iOS] Date and Time Picker shows wrong date in popup. #3759
  • The Onplatform condition does not work properly in MacCatalyst. #3758
  • [iOS, MacCatalyst] Application getting crashed if load RadioButton. #3757
  • DatePicker popup is not showing the selected date #3756
  • App icon not showing in build #3755

Closed

  • [Bug] [Android] System.InvalidOperationException: 'LoadTemplate should not be null' when setting CollectionView with empty data template. #2526

PullRequests

Created

  • [Catalyst] Fix OnPlatform on macOS #3763
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/Xaml </>
  • [iOS] Update DatePickerHandler and TimePickerHandler #3761
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎

Merged

  • [android] reduce JNI calls by moving logic into Java #3372
    area/perf 🏎️
  • Return a blank Label when LoadTemplate is null to prevent Hot Reload crashes #3692
    area/tooling ⚙️

Updated

  • Try with a delay #3752
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Merge 6.0.100-preview11 to main #3750
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Add CarouselView handlers on Controls #3141
  • [iOS] Implement VerticalTextAlignment property in Label #3714
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮
  • Adds Tizen backend #2360
    area/setup 🪄

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • compiler errors in compiled model #27007
  • Small regression in Parent Variations perf #27001
  • Update Production Database to With Migration Files #26998
  • Static analysis indicates issues with either NRT annotations or usage #26995
  • Placeholder #26994
  • "ORA-00972: identifier is too long" on alias #26993

Closed

  • Distinguish cancellation from failure to allow different logging strategies #19526
    7.0.0
  • Insert Order (Incorrect) for children entities after upgrading from 3.1 to 6 #26997
  • Issue with HasPartitionKey when specify nested property #26978
  • ChangeTracker and the results of deserializing data of tree-like structures #26977
  • invalidcastexception in unit tests using in memory on count, firstordefault, of many to many related entities #26893
  • Whether to support, object association entity table #26826
  • An item with the same key has already been added #26757
  • Switch to the standard reflection API for decoding nullability information #24744
    7.0.0
  • Fix issues raised by static analysis #26805
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Query: Don't skip any parameter in projection #27008
    auto-merge
  • WithMany doc: fix the sample expression #27003
  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1 #27002
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0 #27000
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #26999
  • Add Xunit.Abstractions to implicit usings #26996

Merged

  • Replace our nullability decoding with the new BCL API #26967
  • Static analysis: revert tail recursion unrolling #26970
  • Distinguish cancellation from failure #26988
  • Static analysis: deconstruction #26969
  • Static analysis: inconsistent naming and namespaces #26919

Updated

  • Add AtTimeZoneExpression and some relevant translations #26972
    needs-design
  • Temporal table support for owned and table splitting scenarios #26935
  • SQL row value comparison syntax #26936
  • [6.0.2] Query: Defer inline-ing owned navigation expansion till all joins are generated #26617
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.2
  • [6.0.2] Detach join entity when removing added relationship #26892
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.2
  • [6.0.2] Call sync connection close instead of async #26943
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.2
  • [6.0.2] Handle duplicate property infos when sorting columns. #26958
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.2
  • [6.0.2] Restore the ability to break multiple FK cycles #26959
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.2
  • [6.0.2] Add the ability to break self-ref cycles between added and removed entities #26963
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.2
  • No test left behind: Ef6GroupByTest #26974
